name: My Bicycle Is Broken
description:
Warning: the game does not seem to properly work on Firefox and Safari. Please use Chromium or another Chromium based browser like Chrome. My Bicycle is Broken

My Bicycle is Broken is a toy game where you can interact with a broken bike and repair it. It's a really small toy and there's no goal, just interactions.

How to play

You can interact with the bicycle by clicking or dragging.

To fix a broken part, you can drag the oil can on the part.

Notes

Made by Martin Cirice in 3h for the Trijam #203: "Cycle is broken", with Godot 4 (beta) and Procreate.
